description: A young man becomes suspicious when his recently widowed mother decides to re-marry soon after his stepfather's death.
keywords: male rear nudity,sex on a beach,car roll over,graveside service,drinking champagne
name: Fascination

review.name: good intentions
review.reviewBody: Adam Garcia shirtless, Jacqueline Bisset and Stuart Wilson, a script which many holes, fragile links between scenes and beautiful landscape. love stories so confusing than is not easy to understand the purpose. and ambition to create a thriller. the best thing - the good idea who remains only the roots for the film . result - good intentions. and that could be enough in this case. the worst fact is the absence of an axis. the film seems be result of improvisation. no precise plot, not a coherent story. only crumbs of revenge who seems be remind about Hamlet, a confuse plan and the poor Alice Evans as cardinal. a film for the fans of genre.
